title: Amino acid sequence of cytochrome c 1

content.question: Using the data in the table, create a phylogenetic tree on the template provided to reflect the evolutionary relationships of the organisms. Provide reasoning for the placement on the tree of the species that is least related to the others.

frqParts.text: Using the data in the table, create a phylogenetic tree on the template provided to reflect the evolutionary relationships of the organisms. Provide reasoning for the placement on the tree of the species that is least related to the others.

skill.text: 2.D: Represent relationships within biological models, including mathematical models, diagrams, flowcharts, and systems.
